appDescription.message: Kiosk app used to be able to generate codes used in votings.

welcomeIntro.message: Welcome! In this kiosk you can generate your code for the following voting: "$voting$".

welcomeIntro2.message: To continue, click the arrow button in the bottom left corner and follow the steps.

insertCard.message: Insert your DNI-E as shown in the picture, please.

dataConfirmation.message: If the above information is correct, please click the tick button in the bottom right corner.

showcodeIntro.message: We've now generated your code successfully. Please, scan the following QR code with the voting app.

showcodeIntroAgain.message: You had already generated a code, so we've now generated another one. Keep in mind that the old code can no longer be used. Please, scan the following QR code with the voting app.

showcodePrint.message: I would like it in paper
